questions.question: What is the dominant color of the pet carrier's main body?
What color are the accent stripes and zipper pulls on the carrier?

What is the overall shape of the pet carrier when closed?

What type of opening mechanism is visible on the carrier's front panel?

What is the visible construction of the carrier's base?

What is the approximate size of the carrier, relative to the puppy inside?

Is the carrier's design primarily minimalist or elaborate in its details?
